CatDescriptText: Leroy Perkins, owner TV and Refrigeration Service, 2159 Centre Avenue, was part of the Pittsburgher's Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 5, 1959 with question: "Do you believe Allegheny County Democrats and Republicans have selected their best candidates for public offices in past 10 years?" Answer reads: "I do not think they have.  I believe if Republicans had selected better candidates they might have had better luck in the past 10 years."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Leroy Perkins wearing short sleeved square and diamond patterned shirt, moustache, and eyeglasses, standing in front of building with glass block, possibly Centre Avenue
